quickLabel.description: Button to start a game of marathon

quickDescription.message: Jump right into a game of Marathon with the default settings

guidelineDescription.message: Standard variant of the puzzle found in most modern games

tetraxDescription.message: A custom variant of the puzzle originally designed for this game

retroDescription.message: Classic variant of the puzzle loved by oldschool players

arcadeDescription.message: Difficult variant of the puzzle loved by hardcore players

settingsDescription.message: Import and export your settings here

normalDescription.message: Starts off slow, but progressively gets faster. Meant for beginners.

trialDescription.message: You're ranked based on how well you play. Meant for players of all skill level.

virtuosoDescription.message: Insanely fast stacking and dangerous obstacles. Can you keep up? Meant for experienced players.

excavatorDescription.message: Clear all the gems before the time runs out! Meant for players of all skill level.

normal2Description.message: If you beat Normal, try this.

trial2Description.message: If you beat Trial, try this.

virtuoso2Description.message: If you beat Virtuoso, try this.

virtuoso3Description.message: If you beat Virtuoso II, try this.

excavator2Description.message: If you beat Excavator, try this.
